title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Processing of Migrants in Albania
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 18 November 2021.
content:
Instead of chasing headlines about unconscionable offshore processing, the Government should address its own failures.
